Approachable

Just Approach and Use Any Device

What is Approachable?

The electronic devices that we use throughout our days are becoming so much less convenient to use. Approachable makes it easy to turn any device into a Walk-Up-And-Use System. Interaction with Approachable devices is done wirelessly using a smartphone or tablet without any complicated setup or pairing.

No Extra Apps

Approachable devices work with most new phones. Everything you need to control the device is automatically pulled from the web qutomatically when it is needed .

No Pairing

Approachable devices do not require tedious pairing or setup procedures. Start by tapping your phone against the device or selecting it from your notifications. That's it!

No More Blinky Lights

Approachable devices present easy to understand diagnostics and user-friendly control interfaces. No more trying to procedures telling users to hold down four buttons until a light blinks three times.

Maker and Developer Benefits

  • Built on Easy to Integrate Standards
  • No App Development
  • Build Attractive Buttonless Devices
  • Helps with Testing and Diagnostics
  • Low hardware Costs

The Enablers

Approachable is built on some killer standards and technologies to deliver this great user experience

The Physical Web

Eddystone Bluetooth Beacons

NFC
